text: A Thousand Leaves is the 10th album by Sonic Youth. It recieved rave reviews, including an A+ rating from Robert Christgau. Its songs are noticeably longer and more psychedelic than on previous albums. ==Tracklist== #"Contre le sexisme" 3:55 #"Sunday" 4:52 #"Female Mechanic Now On Duty" 7:43 #"Wildflower Soul" 9:04 #"Hoarfrost" 5:01 #"French Tickler" 4:52 #"Hits of Sunshine (For Allen Ginsberg)" 11:05 #"Karen Koltrabe" 9:20 #"The Ineffable Me" 5:21 #"Snare, Girl" 6:38 #"Heather Angel" 6:09 Category:Sonic Youth albums Category:1998 albums
title: A Thousand Leaves
